short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An app to help you make more environmentally friendly purchases, and change your lifestyle one step at a time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As consumers we vote with our dollars. It is critical that we support sustainable climate conscious companies and take our very first step towards ethical consumption. With this app, if you are on amazon.in and shopping for products made with environmentally damaging materials (such as PET, plastic, polyester), our app will automatically detect it and recommend a more environmentally friendly product.
